snippet.title: Shadows of the Sengoku - Unit Loadout Demo
snippet.description:
Howdy folks!

In today's video you can see how the unit loadout/configuration screen is coming along. Features newly implemented animations, armor and weapon display, as well as complete UI overhaul.

-------------------------------

Shadows of the Sengoku is an upcoming Grand Strategy game featuring Turn-Based Tactical combat set in the Sengoku era of Japan. Players will act as the special forces of a daimyo, aiding their clan in fulfilling their ultimate destiniy.

For more information on the game:
http://www.shadowsofthesengoku.jp/
